name: Meta DeKalb Data Center
surroundings_snapshot: South edge of DeKalb near major arterials and industrial growth areas
community_signals: Expansion framed as jobs + investment by City and Meta
stressors: Substation or grid upgrades, water use, backup generators, noise, lighting spill

name: Stream Data Centers Chicago II
address_or_hint: Elk Grove Village, IL (Stream Chicago II)
surroundings_snapshot: Elk Grove positioned as a data center and connectivity hub
stressors: Grid capacity expansions, generator/mechanical noise, construction impacts if further phases

name: Stream Data Centers Chicago I
address_or_hint: Elk Grove Village, IL (Stream Chicago I)
surroundings_snapshot: Same regional cluster dynamics as Chicago II
community_signals: Public framing focuses on infrastructure readiness more than community impact
stressors: Cumulative impacts across nearby sites, grid upgrades, noise

name: Equinix CH3
address_or_hint: Elk Grove area, Chicago metro (Equinix CH3)
surroundings_snapshot: Part of the Elk Grove data center cluster
community_signals: Appears in industry operations context, not community process
stressors: Grid and redundancy infrastructure, generator testing schedules, noise

name: Digital Realty ORD10 (350 E Cermak)
surroundings_snapshot: South Loop dense urban corridor; historic industrial building repurposed over time
community_signals: Emphasis on interconnection ecosystem and modernization, limited community framing
stressors: Generator testing and emissions, rooftop mechanical noise, construction staging impacts

name: CoreSite CH1
surroundings_snapshot: Downtown Chicago near Board of Trade area
community_signals: Public-facing content is facility capabilities, not community engagement
stressors: Generator testing and emissions permitting, rooftop noise, street impacts from upgrades

name: CoreSite CH2
surroundings_snapshot: Near other major hubs; clustered infrastructure zone
community_signals: Commercial framing; community process not foregrounded
stressors: Generator testing, diesel storage, heat rejection, traffic impacts from construction

name: Edged Project Vector
address_or_hint: IL-23 near Keslinger Rd and Crego Rd, DeKalb, IL
surroundings_snapshot: Described as south of Meta DeKalb; planned internal roads to Route 23
community_signals: Multiple hearings; significant public turnout and concerns
stressors: Noise, light pollution, stormwater, landscaping, lighting shielding

name: Equinix Minooka project
address_or_hint: Holt Rd & Ridge Rd, Minooka, IL
surroundings_snapshot: Farmland conversion to a large campus concept; village materials include maps and documents
community_signals: Village FAQ published; open house held
stressors: Water allocation concerns, land use shift, industrial footprint impacts

name: Compass Datacenters campus (former Sears HQ)
surroundings_snapshot: Redevelopment of an existing corporate campus footprint
community_signals: Investment scale and ComEd involvement emphasized
stressors: Demolition impacts, long construction timeline, substation and power delivery planning

name: CloudHQ campus (former United Airlines HQ site)
address_or_hint: Dempster St & Linneman Rd & Algonquin Rd, Mount Prospect, IL
surroundings_snapshot: Borders major arterial roads; village discussions include road and pedestrian upgrades
community_signals: Revisions discussed years after initial approval; ongoing negotiation
stressors: Traffic and road modifications, substation integration, power delivery planning

name: Prime Data Centers Prime ORD campus
address_or_hint: 1600 E Higgins Rd, Elk Grove Village, IL
surroundings_snapshot: Elk Grove cluster; first building described as three-story with high MW capacity
community_signals: Mostly investment and construction milestone framing
stressors: Substation and grid upgrades, cumulative impacts with neighbors

name: Stream major campus (subdivision annexation area)
address_or_hint: Elk Grove Village subdivision annexation area
surroundings_snapshot: Embedded in or adjacent to residential blocks; land assembly signal
community_signals: Annexation process is a strong signal to track approvals and mitigation promises
stressors: Direct proximity noise and light, construction disturbance, substations mentioned

name: CyrusOne proposed campus (Talkington Township near Waverly)
address_or_hint: Thayer Rd & Clark Rd, Talkington Township, IL
surroundings_snapshot: Rural farmland; proximity to transmission and nearby solar noted in reporting
community_signals: County hosted hearing, collecting questions and comments; organized opposition reported
stressors: Power draw magnitude, grid implications, water supply and utility planning concerns

name: Karis Critical (Naperville Lucent site)
surroundings_snapshot: Suburban site close to homes; framed within I-88 corridor redevelopment context
community_signals: Months of organized opposition; large public turnout; conditional use permit denied Jan 20, 2026
stressors: Diesel generators, fuel storage and deliveries, noise, air quality, power demand framing, process trust
